categories: Category:Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2

nodes.text: Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 96

Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 96 is the ninety-sixth issue of the Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 published by De Agostini. It contained a motor and gearbox that controlled the buildable R2-D2's head.
